drivers.name: epson-escpr
drivers.comments:
This software is a filter program used with the Common UNIX Printing System (CUPS) under Linux. It supplies high quality printing with Seiko Epson Color Ink Jet Printers.

This product supports only ESC/P-R printers.

For a list of printers supported by this package, please refer to the EPSON Download Center:

notes:
All-in-One color inkjet printer.

Epson provides a free (GPL) driver for this printer.

Maximum paper width: 21.0 cm / 8.3 inches
